definition[0]: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it
example[0]: an attorney who is a specialist in banking law
definition[1]: a doctor who knows more about one particular type of illness or treatment than other doctors
definition[2]: a person or business that has a lot of skill or knowledge in a particular subject, and often gives advice to others
example[2]: Many technical specialists are employed in commerce and the service sector.
example[3]: Heâ€™s a specialist in the insurance industry.
definition[3]: a dealer on a stockmarket who buys and sells shares in a small list of companies for investors
